solarpanels.description: Lowest Cost Solar Panels in America
solarpanels.name: Solar Panels

model3.about_exterior: With a drag coefficient of just .208 Cd, the lowest on the planet, Model 3 is built for speed, endurance and range. Improved aerodynamics and a wider chassis offer more responsive performance so you can take corners quicker and with more confidence.
model3.exterior_description_01: Staggered, performance wheels and tires keep the car planted and help transfer maximum power down to the road.
model3.exterior_description_02: Attention to detail on all exterior surfaces makes Model S the most aerodynamic production car on Earth.
model3.exterior_description_03: An iconic silhouette meets refreshed, elegant proportions.
model3.interior_description_01: A 22-speaker, 960-watt audio system with Active Road Noise Reduction offers immersive listening and studio-grade sound quality.
model3.interior_description_02: Up to 10 teraflops of processing power enables in-car gaming on-par with today’s newest consoles. Wireless controller compatibility lets you game from any seat.
model3.interior_description_03: Multi-device Bluetooth, wireless and USB-C charging for every passenger, with enough power to fast-charge your tablets and laptop.
model3.name: Model 3
model3.section_description: Model 3 comes with the option of dual motor all-wheel drive, 20” Überturbine Wheels and Performance Brakes for total control in all weather conditions. A carbon fiber spoiler improves stability at high speeds, all allowing Model 3 to accelerate from 0-60 mph* in as little as 3.1 seconds.

models.about_exterior: With a drag coefficient of just .208 Cd, the lowest on the planet, Model S is built for speed, endurance and range. Improved aerodynamics and a wider chassis offer more responsive performance so you can take corners quicker and with more confidence.
models.exterior_description_01: Staggered, performance wheels and tires keep the car planted and help transfer maximum power down to the road.
models.exterior_description_02: Attention to detail on all exterior surfaces makes Model S the most aerodynamic production car on Earth.
models.exterior_description_03: An iconic silhouette meets refreshed, elegant proportions.
models.interior_description_01: Instantly connect with multi-device Bluetooth, or fast charge devices with wireless and 36-watt USB-C charging.
models.interior_description_02: A 22-speaker, 960-watt audio system with Active Road Noise Reduction offers immersive listening and studio-grade sound quality.
models.interior_description_03: With front and rear trunks and fold-flat seats you can fit your bike without taking the wheel off—and your luggage too.
models.name: Model S
models.section_description: Model S Plaid has the quickest acceleration of any vehicle in production. Updated battery architecture for all Model S trims enables back-to-back track runs without performance degradation.

modelx.about_exterior: With the lowest drag coefficient of any SUV, Model X is built for speed and range. Refined aerodynamic elements work together with new wheels and tires to help you travel farther, with sharper handling and better ride comfort.
modelx.exterior_description_01: New performance tires deliver better handling and ride quality with lower rolling resistance and are paired with new aerodynamic wheels for an updated look.
modelx.exterior_description_02: Attention to detail on all exterior surfaces makes Model X the most aerodynamic production SUV on Earth.
modelx.exterior_description_03: Exterior design combines an iconic look with elegant proportions.
modelx.interior_description_01: Up to 10 teraflops of processing power enables in-car gaming on-par with today’s newest consoles. Wireless controller compatibility lets you game from any seat.
modelx.interior_description_02: Multi-device Bluetooth, wireless and USB-C charging for every passenger, with enough power to fast-charge your tablets and laptop.
modelx.interior_description_03: A 22-speaker, 960-watt audio system with Active Road Noise Reduction offers the best listening experience wherever you are.
modelx.name: Model X
modelx.section_description: With the most power and quickest acceleration of any SUV, Model X Plaid is the highest performing SUV ever built. All Model X powertrains, with updated battery architecture, can deliver instant torque at any speed.

modely.about_exterior: With the lowest drag coefficient of any SUV, Model Y is built for speed and range. Refined aerodynamic elements work together with new wheels and tires to help you travel farther, with sharper handling and better ride comfort.
modely.exterior_description_01: New performance tires deliver better handling and ride quality with lower rolling resistance and are paired with new aerodynamic wheels for an updated look.
modely.exterior_description_02: Attention to detail on all exterior surfaces makes Model X the most aerodynamic production SUV on Earth.
modely.exterior_description_03: Exterior design combines an iconic look with elegant proportions.
modely.interior_description_01: With front and rear trunks and fold-flat seats you can fit your bike without taking the wheel off—and your luggage too.
modely.interior_description_02: A 22-speaker, 960-watt audio system with Active Road Noise Reduction offers the best listening experience wherever you are.
modely.interior_description_03: Instantly connect with multi-device Bluetooth, or fast charge devices with wireless and 36-watt USB-C charging.
modely.name: Model Y
modely.section_description: Tesla All-Wheel Drive has two ultra-responsive, independent electric motors that digitally control torque to the front and rear wheels—for far better handling, traction and stability control. Model Y is capable in rain, snow, mud and off-road.

solarpanels.about_info: Our solar panels are low-profile and durable — quietly converting sunlight to energy for decades to come. Integrated hardware and simple design achieve this by securing the panels close to your roof and to each other for a minimalist aesthetic. Chat with an energy advisor to ask any questions about Tesla solar panels.
solarpanels.control_info: Manage your solar system from anywhere in the world with 24/7 mobile monitoring. Watch your energy in real time or set your preferences to optimize for energy independence.
solarpanels.description: Lowest Cost Solar Panels in America—Money-back guarantee
solarpanels.design: Black sollar cells and aluminium backsheet
solarpanels.heading: Solar for Existing Roofs
solarpanels.name: Solar Panel
solarpanels.protection_info: Use solar energy to power your home and reduce your dependence on the grid. Purchase solar at the lowest price of any national provider with Tesla's price match guarantee and take control of your monthly electricity bill. Learn more about your potential savings in our Design Studio.

solarroof.about_info: Powerwall is a compact home battery that is bundled with every Tesla solar purchase, providing you with 24/7 energy security. It stores the energy you produce with Solar Roof, so you can power your home anytime—at night or during an outage.
solarroof.control_info: With the Tesla app, you can monitor your energy production in real time. Control your system from anywhere with instant alerts and remote access.
solarroof.description: Transform your roof and produce clean energy
solarroof.design: Light gray sollar cells and aluminium backsheet
solarroof.heading: Solar Roof
solarroof.name: Solar Roof
solarroof.protection_info: Solar Roof tiles are durable, strong and engineered for all-weather protection. With a 25-year warranty, Solar Roof tiles will continue to produce clean energy for your home for decades to come.
